abstract: Judge Jed S. Rakoff must approve Citigroup's $285 million settlement, but he has assailed the S.E.C. for resolving cases without making defendants admit wrongdoing.
snippet: Judge Jed S. Rakoff must approve Citigroup's $285 million settlement, but he has assailed the S.E.C. for resolving cases without making defendants admit wrongdoing.

headline.main: Citigroup Deal to Go to Judge Critical of S.E.C. Practices
headline.print_headline: Citigroup Deal to Go to Judge Critical of S.E.C. Practices
